story:
Story of My Book

Seasons of the Birch is a historical fiction account of the perseverance, sacrifice, and resilience of a young U.S. Army Nurse, Ruth, at the end of World War II in the Philippines. Ruth’s challenges begin anew as she returns home to a changing country eager to forget her service in the post-war era of the late 1940s and 1950s.

My name is Susan Puska and I am the author of Seasons of the Birch. During WWII, ordinary people stepped forward to serve their nation in a time of need. I wrote this book because I wanted to tell untold stories of women, minorities, and others who were seldom recognized for their contributions. They returned home changed, many hoping to create a better life for themselves and the next generation as they faced old and new challenges.

Each person’s life is a hero’s journey between the forces of light and darkness. In reading this book, I hope through the main character, Ruth, who becomes a nurse in the early 1940s, you will discover a generation of young Americans as they struggle through challenges and adversity. I want you to see this book as an opportunity to explore how poverty, class, bigotry, conformity, and global war shaped America’s World War II generation, and how ordinary people met their challenges with perseverance and resilience.

Seasons of the Birch follows Ruth as she grows up under difficult circumstances in Michigan’s Upper Peninsula and volunteers for the U.S. Army Nurse Corps. Her war takes her to the Philippines where she serves in a general hospital unit during 1945. After the war, Ruth journeys to create a new life, marrying a fellow Army veteran, John, who suffers violent wartime flashbacks and anxiety. Together they seek comfort and renewal along the shores of Lake Superior as they build a life and family together during the late 1940s and 1950s.

You will love this book if you want to:

  • Explore how regular people overcame poverty, hardship, and extraordinary challenges in America between the 1920s and 1950s.
  • Examine a time when everyday Americans served and survived the ugly brutality of global war.
  • Understand the healing power of nature.


Seasons of the Birch speaks to military veterans, their families, women, and minorities who want to examine differing personal perspectives on war and service.

Ultimately, I hope that Seasons of the Birch inspires reflection and fruitful dialogue leading to engaging questions like:

  • How did America change during WWII socially, economically, and militarily?
  • Why and how were the wartime contributions of women and minorities consciously undervalued after the war?
  • Women and minorities in America pay a heavy cost for discrimination (racism and sexism). What is the national cost? What are the legacies today?
  • What myths - from the family level to the national level - were created after WWII? How do younger generations today view WWII and the role their families may have played in it?

 

I look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with my readers. I believe discussing untold stories, and resilience against hardships and discrimination will change us all for the better.

The Book - Seasons of the Birch

The book is written in 5 parts.

Introduction. This introduces the main setting of the Upper Peninsula, the people who inspired this story, and provides some historical context from the 1920s and 1930s to the war years and onward to the late 1940s to 1950s.

Part 1 Into the Storm - contains chapters 1-4. In this section the reader meets the main character, Ruth, as she overcomes poverty and tragedy to become a registered nurse. In 1945 she volunteers to serve in the U.S. Army Nurse Corps and leaves Michigan for the first time, ultimately crossing the Pacific Ocean on the Lurline troop transport ship under the threat of a Japanese submarine and kamikaze attacks. She transforms into a war nurse providing medical care to mounting casualties of battle and tropical diseases, as the Japanese forces fight to the death.

Part 2 A Kind of Victory - contains chapters 5-8. The war in the Pacific ends abruptly with the nuclear bombings of Hiroshima and Nagasaki (killing between 129,000 and 226,000 civilians) and the surrender of Japan on August 15, 1945, but Ruth must remain in the Philippines with her hospital unit caring for casualties through the Christmas holiday until January 1946 when she is reassigned to the States for outprocessing. In the U.S., she struggles against indifference and discrimination while reckoning with her wartime experiences and moving forward with her life.

Part 3 Return North - contains chapters 9-12. Ruth returns north to the Upper Peninsula to help her sister in Sault Ste. Marie, Michigan, where she gets a nursing position at the War Memorial Hospital. Soon after arriving, she works on a case involving burned Native American children that requires her to draw on her wartime experience, but also brings up wartime memories. She meets and marries a fellow Army veteran, hoping to build a good life together and raise a family. But she underestimates the depth of his post traumatic stress, and her ability to help and change him, which pushes her to make hard decisions for her family.

Part 4 Bending to the Wind - contains chapter 13. Ruth is alone at the end of a long life. She reflects back on her marriage to John, and how their life developed, especially after the children left home to create their own lives. She assesses her experiences and wonders what lies ahead for her. Is there more for her to do? Or has she completed her journey?
 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in April 2021.
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this Spring.

 

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover and an audiobook.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!

 

About the Author

Susan M. Puska is a retired U.S. Army Colonel and President and CEO of KANAVA International, LLC — a service-disabled veteran-owned, women-owned small business working within international development that focuses on empowering the sustainability of local organizations and communities.

She was inspired to write this book by the life of her mother who served in the U.S. Army Nurse Corps during World War II, and her father who served as an aerial gunner in the European Theater in North Africa, Sicily, and on bombing missions over occupied Europe while based in England. She was moved by the courage and suffering of World War II veterans, many of whom faded away into their own personal struggles after the parades ended. Some veterans, like her mother, received little recognition or appreciation for their service after the war. Like many minorities as well, some women had difficulty obtaining their veteran’s benefits and were denied membership in veteran organizations. She wanted to highlight these untold stories from the war.

When she is not writing and avoiding the COVID-19 virus, she enjoys photography, travel, trees, and long walks. She was born and raised in Michigan’s Upper Peninsula and comes from a family of military veterans that extends back to the Civil War. In the Army, she served as an Ordnance Officer and Foreign Area Officer (FAO) that specialized in China, where she served three tours of duty, culminating with her assignment as the U.S. Army Attache at the U.S. Embassy, Beijing. She also served in the Pentagon, Department of State, and U.S. Army War College as a China FAO.

For more information, you can connect with Susan M. Puska at smpuskaauthor@gmail.com and on Facebook susan.puskaauthor.1 and Linked In.
 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #seasonsofthebirch and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Susan

Puska at smpuskaauthor@gmail.com and on Facebook susan.puskaauthor.1 and Linked In. Risks & Challenges The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier.The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship. Other Ways You Can Help Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #seasonsofthebirch and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts.
You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.
Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.
Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!Thanks again,Susan

story:
Short Summary

Renaissance is dedicated to continuing to elevate the works of marginalized voices and fostering a culture of collaboration with our authors. We have been growing leaps and bounds in the past year, and there are a few important things to do to keep up with this growth.

What We Need & What You Get

The first thing we want to do this year is turn the company into a workers’ cooperative. We believe this is the best model for us; it’ll allow leadership to be truly democratic and our workers to have a real say in the decision-making process. This change is expensive, but we feel it’s the right time for us to make this move.

We’re also very close to reaching the point where we can apply for grants, but we've incurred some unforeseen expenses that are preventing us from taking these next step.

But the good news is that we have inventory surplus, a few very slightly damaged books we’d like to get off our hands, and tons of cool other things we can offer you, so we thought we’d get fundraising!

The rewards! 

5$ books!

Get yourself a deeply discounted copy of any of the following (want to get two, or three books? Simply edit your pledge amount accordingly):

Blood Relations

Brothers in Arms

Kindred Spirits

Blood Matters

Thrills on Ice

Great Minds Colouring book

 

10$ books!

Get yourself a deeply discounted copy of any of the following (want to get two, or three books? Simply edit your pledge amount accordingly):

The ARC of Nothing Without Us (limited!)

Skylark (some stains)

Life in the ‘Cosm (cover slightly bent)

20$ A spiffy t-shirt with one of our designs!

Any of the buttons on our website, you can get it made as a t-shirt of the colour of your choice!

40$ two anthologies!

Get both We Shall Be Monsters and Nothing Without Us at a discount! Or get two of either, and give a copy to a friend!

50$ Your portrait (head and shoulders)

Want a spiffy new avatar for social media? Want the portrait of your favorite character? Want to offer a flattering portrait to a loved one as a Valentine’s day present? This is for you!

75$ One character, standing

Do you have an RPG character that you would love to see a full portrait? Or would you like to finally get that perfect picture of your pet who’s 100% unphotographeable? This is for you!

100$ A Cameo in Some Assembly Required the comic

See yourself as a character in one of my upcoming pages! (Check out the comic there: https://tapas.io/episode/1614605) 

150$ A family portrait

Last year, I gave my mother a family picture which showed all of us, together, with my departed grandmother and father. If you have loved ones you miss, I can put them in a picture with you; or I can just give you a portrait of your lovely family!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign! Share with your friends!

story:
The Story of My Book

 

My name is Catherine A. Wood and I am the author of I Just Want to Date Myself.

I wrote this book to empower high performing women to master their mindsets, heal their relationship with themselves, and find purpose and pleasure in life outside of their resumes, credentials, and promotion potential.

I remember my first meeting with Sue. A colleague of hers had recommended that she talk to me and she was coincidentally in town for a work meeting that allowed us to meet in person. I was impressed by Sue’s appearance, she was dressed to impress and had a beautiful set of gold jewelry on that really struck me. She gave off a very clear energy that she had it all together. She shared with me the field she was in, the level of leadership she had reached. She had poise and magnetism and it was hard not to fall in love with this woman.

Curious to discover why we were meeting, I asked her to share with me why she was curious to meet me. Sue shared that she had been in the same field for nearly two decades at this point. She had reached a level of leadership in her company that set her apart. She had just bought a home and everything appeared to be working for her and yet, her life felt joyless and like there was something missing. She found herself continually being the yes woman in the office, the resident mentor who was always giving to everyone else and not to herself. Sue shared that she was one of the highest performers in her office, but with each additional contract won or new level attained, she would find herself in the same position of momentarily feeling good about herself and then right back to striving for the next achievement.

I wrote this book for Sue, for myself, and for all the high performers out there who find themselves in a similar place of wondering if there isn’t a different way to live. A different path that provides for more fulfillment, joy, meaning, and even impact. Sue’s story isn’t unique, it is common. I’ve spoken with thousands of individuals who resonate with the themes shared here. While sometimes I notice we can avoid being willing to acknowledge our own dissatisfaction or discontent, when we do, we can create the possibility for lasting change.

As a high performer myself, there is a fine line between getting our needs met from within versus sourcing them from our accomplishments or efforts to please others. The challenge with sourcing our happiness or fulfillment from our successes or results is that we never win at that game. We embark on an endless mission for results, temporarily feeling good about ourselves, only to reach for the next goal, the next deadline or project, it’s always the next, and we will find little true meaning or satisfaction.

This book serves as a guide providing another way of accessing the joy and satisfaction that we all long for, and it’s one other than reaching for the next big milestone or goal. It will require a willingness to look within and begin meeting our own needs individually versus leveraging our accomplishments and people pleasuring efforts to put a Band-Aid on our loneliness and discontent.

My hope is that, in reading this book:

  • You will discover a path, a framework, and even a how to, to reinvent the fundamental ways in which you view yourself, access your self-worth, and find joy, meaning and wonder in who you are.
  • You will discover the same delight and excitement that I have for celebrating myself and discover your own ability to see the beauty within you.
  • You will see the book as a resource to help you put these new concepts of acknowledging and celebrating yourself into action so that you can tangibly walk through life with more joy and purpose in your step, with more clarity and power in your voice, and with more intimacy and connectedness in your relationships.

If you think you could benefit from a healthy dose of treating yourself better, whether it be a date, your self-talk, a vacation, or even a gift, then this is the book for you.

I Just Want to Date Myself is a non-fiction book that speaks to high performing women and driven joy seekers who are looking to master their mindsets, heal their relationship with themselves, and find purpose and pleasure in life and in their careers separate from their resumes, credentials, and promotion potential for the first time.

 

The Book - I Just Want To Date Myself

 

The book is written in five parts, with readings and exercises for each day and book club questions for each week so that this book can be read and digested with others...

  • Week 1: Mindset contains the introduction plus the first week of daily lessons on the power of your beliefs and reprogramming our subconscious thoughts. You will learn how to begin getting curious about versus reactive to the people in your life who trigger you and begin discovering how what you cannot be with in them is a mirror for what you cannot be with in yourself. You will learn more about terminal uniqueness and people pleasing and begin to employ tactical ways of choosing differently.
  • Week 2: Spending Quality Time with Yourself contains some of my favorite lessons, practices and rituals on beginning to spend connected time with yourself. You will rediscover the joy in what you like to do, how you most enjoy spending free time with yourself, and you will begin to date yourself. You will also begin to employ practices that will have you know the answer to the timeless question — “what do you want and need right now?” You will get more connected with the parts of yourself that you have ignored or not heeded and begin to reconnect with all the parts of self.
  • Week 3: Embrace and Celebrate dives deeper into some of the topics that likely prevent you from being fully self-expressed and actualized in your life. You will learn methods to access more vulnerability in life, gain a greater sense of belonging, go head-to-head with perfectionism, and examine deeper the ways in which imposter syndrome hold you back and how you can opt out.
  • Week 4: It Takes A Village covers the fourth week of lessons on the importance of community, our inherent need for it, and how you can begin fostering community when yours is lacking.
  • Week 5: Full Self-Expression covers the fifth and final week of lessons on how you can capitalize on your one wild and precious life. You will being to integrate the learnings of this book in week five and connect them with your values, your goals, and your purpose.

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

 

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor
  • The cover design of my book (the mockups you see currently are a placeholder)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book
  • The copy editing for my book
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book

 

When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish.
When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will publish an audiobook.
When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.

I am also offering some exclusive bonuses for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish
  • Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book
  • You will also receive a special invitation to join me on a guided Book Club experience reading my book with five weekly calls facilitated by me to discuss the book club questions for each week and more...

 

About the Author

 

Catherine Amelia Wood is the Founder and Head Coach of coaching firm Unbounded Potential. She works with high performers and entrepreneurs who are committed to making a big impact on the world. Her favorite clients are driven, multitalented and joy seekers.

Leveraging her experience as a Returned Peace Corps Volunteer with 4 years of experience living abroad in the Dominican Republic, she is the Co-Founder of travel company PACK Retreats and leads transformational retreats around the world. Some of her favorite travel memories include jumping for joy on a suspension bridge in the Dominican Republic (to the dismay of her travelers); dancing bangra with her PACK co-founder in a Hindu temple; and traveling across South America with a backpack and a best friend while on a shoestring budget.

Years ago, Catherine found herself emotionally misguided and searching. She was looking for answers on how to live purposefully - both with her capacity to impact change and to be joyful - with her one wild and precious life. She spent much of the following decade traveling the world and searching for the answers included in this book.

Catherine holds the designation of Professional Certified Coach through the International Coach Federation. She has been featured in major media such as Elephant Journal, Huffington Post, Vistaprint, and the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics.

Learn more and connect with Catherine at www.unbounded-potential.com or on Instagram.

 

Risks & Challenges

 

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network.
  • Please use #Ijustwanttodatemyself and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign via Indiegogo at the top of the page
  • Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.


Thank you so much for your love and support. I appreciate it.

With gratitude,
Catherine A. Wood

story:
Quien soy

Me llamo David Frigola Fontacaba. Soy de Figueres (Girona, Spain). Tengo 34 años y siempre me ha gustado escribir. Durante diez años publiqué artículos para periódicos locales, presentando relatos breves a concursos, hasta conseguir mi meta personal que era escribir mi primera novela.

Ahora con vuestra sincera y grata colaboración necesito un último empujoncito para poder traducir y publicar como ebook EL DIAMANTE DE HERKIMER AL INGLÉS.


Mi ilusión

Hace un par de años emprendí mi nuevo camino, mi aventura hacia lo desconocido.

¡Y en unos meses conseguí escribir mis locuras, alucinaciones, imaginaciones, sueños, realidades y verdades! ¡Alucinante!

De aquí surgió EL DIAMANTE DE HERKIMER, una novela de aventuras que tenía que ser ser editada como libro electrónico en catalán, castellano e inglés, y vendible por todo el mundo en los tres idiomas.

Conseguí los dos primeros, pero el inglés quedó apartado hasta que los ingresos futuros me permitiesen sufragar la inversión.

Pero hasta el momento no ha sido posible.

No obstante , como muchos amigos y conocidos me pidieron su versión en papel, pagué de mi bolsillo, igual que con los ebooks, una mini-edición de la novela en catalán, que me ha proyectado a realizar diferentes presentaciones. Tengo fotos y vídeos en mi web www.davidfrigola.com



¡Vuestra ayuda es indispensable!

En 2013 conseguí los derechos para vender mis ebooks en Europa, América y Asia y luego los publiqué en AMAZON.

Me encuentro en una situación crucial para llegar hasta mi meta. Reconozco lo difícil que es que alguien que no me conozca invierta en mí, el casi imposible reto de conseguir la cuantía necesaria para mi propósito...

¡¡¡ AUNQUE ESPERO QUE CON VUESTRA AYUDA E INTERÉS MI SUEÑO SE HAGA REALIDAD!!!




El proyecto en números

Los 2.500 € se dividen en:

    • 1.700€ que corresponden a los 2.200$ destinados íntegramente a la traducción total del libro al Inglés americano. 
    • Los traductores serán Jordi García Lima (Translator, Editor & Proofreader) del cual podéis ver su ficha en: https://www.odesk.com/users/~~d43d6d3775c70730 y Cansu U. (Translator & Creative Writer) con su perfil: https://www.odesk.com/users/~01bfd62823f846ecd9
    • 200€ de cambio de divisas y 5 transferencias a Estados Unidos.

    • 200€ para la compra de 3 Copyrights (portada, título y contenido), número y registro de ISBN y Propiedad Intelectual. El Depósito Legal es gratuito. 

    • 120€  para la transformación a libro digital, fichero *epub sin DRM, compatible con cualquier lector electrónico. De este proyecto en particular se encargará el ingeniero informático Antoni Torrents Mora, el mismo que diseñó mis ebooks en castellano y catalán: www.solucionsinternet.com

    • 200€ Comisión del 9% que se queda Indiegogo si no se consigue el objetivo. En el caso de conseguirlo este se quedaría en un 4%.
    • 80€ correspondientes al 3% de 2.500€ en concepto de pago por tarjetas de crédito o débito. También incluye una tasa de Indiegogo de 20€ por abonar todo lo cobrado en tarjeta en una cuenta no estadounidense.

    En este punto debo agradecer la colaboración especial de mi diseñadora Sara Peraferrer, encargada de retocar la portada para la futura versión inglesa. http://es.linkedin.com/pub/sara-peraferrer/7a/3a/155/es


    Las Recompensas

      • Todo aquel que aporte o supere los 10 € recibirá de regalo el libro digital gratuito en el idioma que desee (catalán, castellano o inglés cuando esté finalizado) y en formato epub.
      • Para los ingresos mayores de 20€ pueden beneficiarse de mi libro en cualquiera de los tres idiomas en pdf imprimible.
      • Los que igualen o superen los 50 euros pueden recibir mi libro en papel en catalán si lo desean, ¡firmado claro! También recibirán más obsequios según los éxitos que conlleve la traducción ya que el sistema dejará registrados los datos y me podré poner en contacto con cada uno de vosotros.
      • Ingresos mayores de 100€, aparte de una  gran alegría que me vais a dar, os merecéis todo lo anterior, eso está claro, y me acordaré de vosotros más adelante, cuando salgan más libros míos y os pueda ofrecer un buen regalo por vuestra gentileza.

      No es fácil desembolsar 100, 50 o 5 euros, soy el primero que lo admite, porque todos tenemos nuestras complicaciones diarias. Por eso...

      ¡A todos os tendré en cuenta, ya que en estos tiempos difíciles contar con los demás es lo más importante!

        Si no logro la meta y no consigo el total de la campaña el dinero irá destinado de todas formas a la traducción al Inglés, hasta donde pueda llegar. 


        ¡Todos me podéis ayudar!

        ¡SÍ, todos podéis ayudarme! Solo tenéis que  difundir de mi campaña, compartidla en vuestras redes sociales, sean digitales o con amigos, conocidos y parientes y colaborar

        ¡para que también sea en parte vuestro sueño!
story_txt:
Quien soy
 Me llamo David Frigola Fontacaba. Soy de Figueres (Girona, Spain). Tengo 34 años y siempre me ha gustado escribir. Durante diez años publiqué artículos para periódicos locales, presentando relatos breves a concursos, hasta conseguir mi meta personal que era escribir mi primera novela. 
Ahora con vuestra sincera y grata colaboración necesito un último empujoncito para poder traducir y publicar como ebook EL DIAMANTE DE HERKIMER AL INGLÉS.



Mi ilusión

Hace un par de años emprendí mi nuevo camino, mi aventura hacia lo desconocido.
¡Y en unos meses conseguí escribir mis locuras, alucinaciones, imaginaciones, sueños, realidades y verdades! ¡Alucinante!
De aquí surgió EL DIAMANTE DE HERKIMER, una novela de aventuras que tenía que ser ser editada como libro electrónico en catalán, castellano e inglés, y vendible por todo el mundo en los tres idiomas. 
Conseguí los dos primeros, pero el inglés quedó apartado hasta que los ingresos futuros me permitiesen sufragar la inversión. 
Pero hasta el momento no ha sido posible.
No obstante , como muchos amigos y conocidos me pidieron su versión en papel, pagué de mi bolsillo, igual que con los ebooks, una mini-edición de la novela en catalán, que me ha proyectado a realizar diferentes presentaciones. Tengo fotos y vídeos en mi web www.davidfrigola.com



¡Vuestra ayuda es indispensable!

En 2013 conseguí los derechos para vender mis ebooks en Europa, América y Asia y luego los publiqué en AMAZON.
Me encuentro en una situación crucial para llegar hasta mi meta. Reconozco lo difícil que es que alguien que no me conozca invierta en mí, el casi imposible reto de conseguir la cuantía necesaria para mi propósito...

¡¡¡ AUNQUE ESPERO QUE CON VUESTRA AYUDA E INTERÉS MI SUEÑO SE HAGA REALIDAD!!!





  
El proyecto en números
 Los 2.500 € se dividen en:


1.700€ que corresponden a los 2.200$ destinados íntegramente a la traducción total del libro al Inglés americano. 
Los traductores serán Jordi García Lima (Translator, Editor & Proofreader) del cual podéis ver su ficha en: https://www.odesk.com/users/~~d43d6d3775c70730 y Cansu U. (Translator & Creative Writer) con su perfil: https://www.odesk.com/users/~01bfd62823f846ecd9



200€ de cambio de divisas y 5 transferencias a Estados Unidos.

200€ para la compra de 3 Copyrights (portada, título y contenido), número y registro de ISBN y Propiedad Intelectual. El Depósito Legal es gratuito. 

120€  para la transformación a libro digital, fichero *epub sin DRM, compatible con cualquier lector electrónico. De este proyecto en particular se encargará el ingeniero informático Antoni Torrents Mora, el mismo que diseñó mis ebooks en castellano y catalán: www.solucionsinternet.com




200€ Comisión del 9% que se queda Indiegogo si no se consigue el objetivo. En el caso de conseguirlo este se quedaría en un 4%.


80€ correspondientes al 3% de 2.500€ en concepto de pago por tarjetas de crédito o débito. También incluye una tasa de Indiegogo de 20€ por abonar todo lo cobrado en tarjeta en una cuenta no estadounidense.
En este punto debo agradecer la colaboración especial de mi diseñadora Sara Peraferrer, encargada de retocar la portada para la futura versión inglesa. http://es.linkedin.com/pub/sara-peraferrer/7a/3a/155/es

Las Recompensas


Todo aquel que aporte o supere los 10 € recibirá de regalo el libro digital gratuito en el idioma que desee (catalán, castellano o inglés cuando esté finalizado) y en formato epub.

Para los ingresos mayores de 20€ pueden beneficiarse de mi libro en cualquiera de los tres idiomas en pdf imprimible.

Los que igualen o superen los 50 euros pueden recibir mi libro en papel en catalán si lo desean, ¡firmado claro! También recibirán más obsequios según los éxitos que conlleve la traducción ya que el sistema dejará registrados los datos y me podré poner en contacto con cada uno de vosotros.

Ingresos mayores de 100€, aparte de una  gran alegría que me vais a dar, os merecéis todo lo anterior, eso está claro, y me acordaré de vosotros más adelante, cuando salgan más libros míos y os pueda ofrecer un buen regalo por vuestra gentileza. 

No es fácil desembolsar 100, 50 o 5 euros, soy el primero que lo admite, porque todos tenemos nuestras complicaciones diarias. Por eso...

¡A todos os tendré en cuenta, ya que en estos tiempos difíciles contar con los demás es lo más importante!

 Si no logro la meta y no consigo el total de la campaña el dinero irá destinado de todas formas a la traducción al Inglés, hasta donde pueda llegar. 
  
¡Todos me podéis ayudar!

¡SÍ, todos podéis ayudarme! Solo tenéis que  difundir de mi campaña, compartidla en vuestras redes sociales, sean digitales o con amigos, conocidos y parientes y colaborar 
¡para que también sea en parte vuestro sueño!

story:
Short Summary

What difference does one year make? After 23 years working in support roles in the higher education industry and the changing world, I found my position eliminated in July 2013. At that time, I did not see myself as a writer. Nearly 360 days later, here I am preparing to publish a book. Wow!

One of the most difficult steps of getting this story out was having my brother read and copy edit my story. Yes, he knew me on the perspective of a sister - but I had not revealed where I was heading and what those steps looked like along the way.

Who am I? My name is Kelly Renee Vizzini and in 2009, I realized that who I was externally wasn't who I felt connected to internally and went on a search to balance the two.  In November 2013, I changed my career path from a traditional one to beginning the process of creating my own business guiding others to find courage within their own lives and aid them in promoting relaxation while helping relieve stress through tools such as universal energy healing (Reiki and Blue Star) and hand reflexology. 

"Are You Picking Up Your Messages" is a non-fiction novel based on my personal journey over the past five years plus the appendix includes a self-help section for beginning your own journey. Self-publishing this book is the light at the end of a long tunnel highlighting the transformation in taking a very behind-the-scenes person to one who is opening the window to share not only my story, but who I am as an author and a heart-centered business woman creating her life to help others on their own journeys. What I am learning is that the light at the end of the tunnel is a doorway to the next chapter in my life and I am excited that you all are a part of it!

The Chapters Include:

1. The Initial Shift
2. A New Type of Journey
3. Coming Home
4. Guidance on the Path
5. New Teachers Enter My Life
6. The Rug is Pulled Out and a Door Opens
7. The Transparency Perspective
8. An Exchange of Love
9. Leap of Faith
10. Who Am I?
11. Relationships
12. Major Change Impacts Career
13. Major Change Impacts Family
14. Major Changes Unleash Long Hidden Emotions
15. Finding Balance and Perspective
16. More Clues
17. What's in Your Toolbox?

Appendix:

Section I: Begin your own Journey
   When is spirit or the Angels connecting with you?
   Understanding and Using Discernment
Section II: Types of Messages
   Dream Journaling
   Numbers
   Animal Symbolism
   Songs
   Do Something New or Different
   Sayings/Phrases
Section III: Need Help in Interpreting the Messages
   Automatic Writing
   Meditation
   Reflection
Section IV: Final Notes
References and Suggested Reading


What's next? The final steps to self-publish it (my final review, copy/paste into upload template, finalize interior, cover, identify distribution, hit submit) and promotion, promotion and promotion. The importance of this phase is to fully see this story from conception of the idea to the words flowing into the computer to the naming of the book to allowing four people to read it to full completion and having you all read it. A journey in learning more about who I was and working through the ebb and flow of getting a project off the ground. 

Your support and contributions will help make it happen! I will be able to promote this book beyond Amazon to key locations both locally and globally. Your support will also allow me to have it spotlighted in key magazines and take it on the road to several book/author conventions.  


What We Need & What You Get

My goal is to have it published by July 5, which is a few days before the previous life chapter came to a close a year ago.  

The Kindle version will be available shortly afterward and potentially an audio version. 

What I offer in return:

  • For $11 - Get Your Name in Lights
    A personal thank you email AND your name on the book website as a supporter.

  • For $25 - Digital Copy!
    A personal thank you email AND your name on the book website as a supporter PLUS the digital copy of the book.

  • For $50 - A Signed Copy!
    A personal thank you email AND your name on the book website as a supporter PLUS I will sign a copy in your name and send it to you after it is published (NOTE: Please add $10 if shipping outside the U.S.)
  • For $101 - Three Signed Copies!
    A personal thank you email AND your name on the book website as a supporter PLUS I will sign three copies in your name (or whomever you request) and send these to you after the book is published.
                          (NOTE: Please add $10 if shipping outside the U.S.)
Messages behind the numbers:
  • 11 - asks us to utilize our natural abilities and talents to help others
  • 25 - making important life changes will bring new opportunities your way
  • 50 - have the courage to live your life as it fits you
  • 101 - it is time to start your own journey; your thoughts, beliefs, and mindset create your reality
Where the $2000+ funds will go
  • Advertisement - Book / Author Magazine Spotlights
  • Marketing / Book Signing Materials
  • Promotion, Promotion, Promotion
  • Entry into some Book Fairs/Conventions
Any funds raised (even if the entire goal is not met) will go towards promotion of "Are You Picking Up Your Messages."

The Impact

Your help allows me to make the book and my story available to more people in an online environment as while as keeping it accessible to those that visit physical bookshops and other locations.

This book teaches others that we all can find the courage to change our lives and the world around us for the better. There are tips throughout the author's story along with a special section.

Go to my personal author website to learn more about this project:
www.are-you-picking-up-your-messages.com


    Other Ways You Can Help

    For those of you who'd like to contribute but are unable to do so financially, that's okay. Here's how you can help... and yes, it will really help!

    Spread the word about this campaign! Let your Facebook/Social Media and friends know about this and give them the link. Use the Indiegogo share tools!

    And that’s all there is to it.

    Thank you again for your help!

    Kelly Renee Vizzini

story:
BBC Bias Peaceful Rally/Protest IV "The People's Voice"

Glasgow Green - 16 August at 18:00–20:00

Confirmed Performers:
Billy Bates, Callum Baird, Shaun Moore, Ted Christopher, Yew Choob Jock Scott (BBC Blah Blah),

Too Be Confirmed
Citizen Smart, 50 Shades of Blue, The Move:ment,

Kevin Gore - (Unavailable due to his Edinburgh Fringe Festival Gig)

Confirmed Speakers: Cllr Shabbar Jaffri, Joshua Brown, Pat Lee, Tommy Sheridan

Too Be Confirmed Keiran Hurley


WE need to raise these funds to take the campaign up a notch with a bigger audience and large portable trailer stage with lighting and projectors on Glasgow Green the cost of setting up, adminstration and possibly bringing acts from further afield,  Any unused funds after the event will be given to help fund foodbanks, Yes groups or Charities.

All donations will be recorded, with PayPal and other receipts saved on file and printed out for accountability.

A peaceful family event aimed at the biased reporting of the media particularly the publicly funded BBC and also the facts of independence and information supplied to our undecided friends who are finding information hard to access. Now more recently their coverage or biased coverage of the "Genocide" going on in Palestine.

story:
Escaping from a fierce mage battle between his father Loran and his arch enemy Quaron in the year 300bc, Oggston finds out that his portal to safety has stranded him in the year 2012. Getting help from some local wizards and the foreign exchange club at his new school, Grizzly High, Oggston sets out to find his way back home. This is book one of a thirteen book series or so. Each book focuses on a different country and shows a real location, food, drink and game the kids play there. I also toss in a mythological creature from the country to add some excitement. So come follow Oggston and the gang through some wild adventures with Sasquatch, vampires, werewolves and many more creatures that seek to ruin their day.

The funding of this project will go towards making a cool website that has all the trimmings.

Illustrators  needs motivation to make a ton of art, so funds will be required for that.

Advertising is an expensive part of any good project, so a Big chunk of the funds will go towards that.

Publishing is never cheap and for a good quality book, funds will be needed.

I look forward to your help in making this project come alive.

***Six lucky supporters will get a guest spot in future books. We will set up a time to skype and go over the details of your character and or company name/ organization's name.

story:
Short Summary

‘Snapshot of A Soul Place’ is my story as the mother of a person with Down Syndrome, told in painting, poetry, photos and prose. I’m seeking funds to design and print the first edition of this book.

I’m a self-employed artist and landscape gardener living in Castlegar, British Columbia with my 24 year old daughter Mielle. I’m writing this book to share our triumphs, challenges, hopes and fears in the land of special needs.

Perhaps the greatest obstacle faced by a person with special needs is being misunderstood and in turn, isolated, from life’s processes and events. This book is my way of bridging that gap in words and images drawn from the ins and outs and ups and downs of our day to day journey.

What We Need & What You Get

The cost of design and printing:

  • By buying an advance copy you will help finance the printing of the book, which will cost $3500 for a run of 250 copies.
  • If you make a donation above and beyond, we will send you a print of one of my paintings from the book (see below).
  • Any additional money raised will allow us more time to work with the professional graphic designer who is assisting our primary designer, my son Max. We hope to raise at least $1000 for this.
  • If we don't reach our goal, we will overcome every obstacle to continue our work on this project  so my story will still make it into your hands.
  • Thank you for your interest and support.
rays me
and connect me
until I get things right.
keep me linked and loved
don’t let me ice up
like a floe without flow.
reach for me if you will,
I’m talkin’ send in
what you can
If you understand
the sun & the moon
and the cosmic no plan.
close in on me
when I am far away.
see me there in the dark
a starry night spark.
take my laughter
into your heart,
and I will do the same
for you.



    Thank you!

story:
Kurzbeschreibung

Die Dissertation von Anna über Heinrich Spiero ist fertig und erfolgreich verteidigt worden. Nun muss sie "nur noch" gedruckt werden.

Leider ist dies auch heute noch im Internet-Zeitalter eine kostspielige Angelegenheit und deswegen brauchen wir Eure Unterstützung.

Wir (Anna und Ich) würden uns freuen, wenn Ihr Euch mit einen kleinen Obulus beteiligt. Größere Spenden sind auch willkommen.

Eine persönliche Widmung ist natürlich auch käuflich!
